original: Åkesson, Åke, stadsassessor, Göteborg, f. 9/2/13 i Malmö av dir. Aug. Å. o. Ester Olsson. G. 40 m. Anne-Marie Ericsson. Barn : Anders f. 42, Ingvar 46. — Studrex. i Gbg 31, avg:-ex. fr. Gbgs hand:inst. 32, jur. kand. i Upps. 38. Tingstjg. i Sunnervikens doms. 39-42, e. not. v. drätselkamm. i Gbg 43, not. där 44, stadsassess. fr. 46.
translated: Åkesson, Åke, city assessor, Gothenburg, b. 9/2/13 in Malmö, son of director August Å. and Ester Olsson. Married for 40 years to Anne-Marie Ericsson. Children: Anders b. 42, Ingvar b. 46. Completed studies in Gothenburg in 1931, graduated from Gothenburg's School of Commerce in 1932, received a law degree from Uppsala University in 1938. Served as a court clerk in Sunnerviken District Court from 1939 to 1942, then became a deputy secretary of the financial board in Gothenburg in 1943. Appointed as a clerk in Gothenburg in 1944 and became a city assessor from 1946.
